value.description: We have so much experience now. We should be able to get the very best commodities.
After so much time, I can expect to have most of the things I want.
We're been at this for a while. I can start to be a bit picky about things.
We're getting used to this. We should have a minimum of commodities now.
We're getting there, but I still shouldn't expect much yet.
We have only just begun this adventure. I need to steel myself to survive.

li.label: extremely low expectations
li.description: I'm out in the open, and our trial has only just begun. I shouldn't expect anything.

li.label: very low expectations
li.description: I'm out in the open, and we didn't have much time to prepare. I shouldn't expect much for now.

li.label: low expectations
li.description: I'm out in the open. We had time to prepare, but this is still the wildness.

li.label: prisoner
li.description: I have been taken prisoner. I can't really hope for a good treatment.

li.label: in foreign land
li.description: I'm not in my home land. I won't expect too much right now.
